HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Tian Tian is renowned for its succulent chicken and fragrant rice, making it a must-try for anyone visiting Singapore.
Located at Maxwell Food Centre, Ah Tai offers a delicious alternative to Tian Tian with its tender chicken and flavorful rice.

HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.hawker_name: Liao Fan Hong Kong Soya Sauce Chicken Rice & Noodle
HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: This stall gained fame as the first Michelin-starred hawker stall, offering a unique twist on the traditional chicken rice with its soya sauce chicken.

HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.hawker_name: Tiong Bahru Hainanese Boneless Chicken Rice
HAWKER_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Known for its boneless chicken rice, Tiong Bahru offers a convenient and tasty option for chicken rice lovers.
Five Star is famous for using free-range chicken, resulting in a less fatty and more flavorful dish.

query: Where can I find the best Hainanese Chicken Rice in Singapore?
